title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, and bacon.
instructions: Boil pasta. Fry guanciale. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken. Grill until charred. Simmer in tomato gravy.

title: Beef Wellington
summary: Tender beef wrapped in mushroom duxelles and puff pastry.
instructions: Sear beef. Wrap in mushrooms and pastry. Bake until golden.

title: Mushroom Risotto
summary: Creamy Arborio rice slow-cooked with earthy mushrooms.
instructions: Sauté mushrooms. Add rice and stock slowly while stirring.

title: Classic Cheeseburger
summary: Juicy beef patty with cheddar, lettuce, and tomato.
instructions: Grill patty. Melt cheese. Assemble on toasted bun.

title: Pad Thai
summary: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, peanuts, and sprouts.
instructions: Soak noodles. Stir-fry shrimp and tofu. Add sauce and noodles.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Simple Italian pizza with mozzarella and fresh basil.
instructions: Roll dough. Add sauce and cheese. Bake at high heat.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Crisp cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Chop vegetables. Toss with olive oil and oregano. Top with feta.

title: Beef Pho
summary: Vietnamese noodle soup with thin beef slices and herbs.
instructions: Simmer broth with spices. Pour over raw beef and noodles.

title: Sushi Platter
summary: Assorted nigiri and maki rolls with fresh seafood.
instructions: Season rice. Slice fish. Roll with nori or press onto rice.

title: French Onion Soup
summary: Caramelized onions in rich broth with melted gruyère.
instructions: Slow-cook onions. Add stock. Top with bread and cheese. Broil.

title: Lobster Roll
summary: Chunky lobster meat in a buttered brioche bun.
instructions: Mix lobster with mayo and lemon. Stuff into toasted bun.

title: Butter Chicken
summary: Mild aromatic chicken curry in a silky tomato sauce.
instructions: Cook chicken. Prepare buttery gravy. Combine and simmer.

title: Ratatouille
summary: Provencal stewed vegetables layered in a spiral.
instructions: Slice veggies. Layer over tomato sauce. Bake until tender.

title: Tiramisu
summary: Coffee-soaked ladyfingers with mascarpone cream.
instructions: Dip fingers in coffee. Layer with cream. Chill for 4 hours.

title: Fish and Chips
summary: Crispy battered cod served with thick-cut fries.
instructions: Make beer batter. Dip fish and fry. Double-fry the potatoes.

title: Chili Con Carne
summary: Hearty beef and bean stew with spicy peppers.
instructions: Brown beef. Add veggies and spices. Simmer for 1 hour.

title: Bibimbap
summary: Korean rice bowl with mixed vegetables and egg.
instructions: Sauté veggies separately. Place on rice. Top with fried egg.

title: Shrimp Scampi
summary: Garlicky shrimp served over a bed of linguine.
instructions: Boil pasta. Sauté shrimp in garlic butter. Toss together.

title: Eggs Benedict
summary: Poached eggs on muffins with hollandaise sauce.
instructions: Poach eggs. Toast muffins. Whisk hollandaise. Assemble.

title: Lamb Gyro
summary: Sliced lamb in pita bread with tzatziki sauce.
instructions: Roast and slice lamb. Make tzatziki. Wrap in warm pita.

title: Chicken Enchiladas
summary: Corn tortillas rolled with chicken and green sauce.
instructions: Fill tortillas with chicken. Top with sauce and cheese. Bake.

title: Falafel Wrap
summary: Crispy chickpea balls with hummus and pickles.
instructions: Fry chickpea balls. Spread hummus on bread. Wrap everything.

title: Pulled Pork Sliders
summary: Slow-cooked pork with BBQ sauce on mini buns.
instructions: Slow cook pork for 8 hours. Shred and mix with BBQ sauce.

title: Clam Chowder
summary: Creamy soup with fresh clams and potatoes.
instructions: Sauté veggies. Add clams and stock. Simmer with cream.

title: Chicken Alfredo
summary: Fettuccine pasta in rich butter and parmesan sauce.
instructions: Grill chicken. Make cream sauce. Toss with cooked pasta.

title: Miso Ramen
summary: Rich miso broth with noodles and bamboo shoots.
instructions: Boil broth. Add miso. Cook noodles. Top with pork and egg.

title: Lasagna
summary: Layered pasta with meat sauce and bechamel.
instructions: Layer sauce, pasta, meat, and cheese. Repeat. Bake at 180°C.

title: Quinoa Bowl
summary: Healthy grain bowl with chickpeas and kale.
instructions: Cook quinoa. Roast chickpeas. Massaged kale. Mix with tahini.

title: Paella
summary: Spanish rice dish with saffron and seafood.
instructions: Cook rice with saffron. Add chorizo and seafood. Simmer.
